text: Ordered wrong size desk chair. Need size Large instead of Medium. Can you send replacement before I return wrong size? Don't want to wait.
Customized items normally final sale, but printing error changes that. This is our mistake. Full refund $249.99 approved, keep defective item.
Want to return keyboard but it's personalized/customized. Return policy says final sale for customized items. Arrived with printing error though.
Poor quality after one use qualifies for return. Instead of exchange, I'll refund $139 and recommend premium model - higher quality rating. Return label sent.
Returning coffee maker - poor quality construction, seams split after one use. Want exchange for better quality alternative, not same item again.
Original packaging not required for returns. Use any box to protect item during shipping. As long as item unused with tags, full refund $14.99 approved.
Lost original packaging for headphones. Can I still return in different box? Item unused, tags attached, perfect resellable condition.
I can ship size Large tablet now without waiting for Medium return. Prepaid label sent for Medium. If both fit, return whichever doesn't work.
Ordered wrong size monitor. Need size Large instead of Medium. Can you send replacement before I return wrong size? Don't want to wait.
Customized items normally final sale, but printing error changes that. This is our mistake. Full refund $249.99 approved, keep defective item.

Poor quality after one use qualifies for return. Instead of exchange, I'll refund $14.99 and recommend premium model - higher quality rating. Return label sent.
